alert.note: Alert for Baker County; Harney County; Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 11 at 2:24AM PDT until April 12 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT /5 PM PDT/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and wind expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches, except 6 to 12 inches over the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph Monday afternoon and again Tuesday morning through afternoon. * WHERE...Harney County, Baker County and Malheur County zones. * WHEN...From midnight MDT /11 PM PDT/ tonight to 6 PM MDT /5 PM PDT/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered roads, areas of blowing snow, and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Baker County; Harney County; Malheur County
